mapper.select: SELECT sdd.date, count(wckc.id) as addWeCustomerNumber, count(if(wckc.chat_status=1,wckc.id,null)) as weCustomerActiveNumber FROM sys_dim_date sdd LEFT JOIN we_customer_link_count wckc ON sdd.date= date_format(wckc.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') and wckc.del_flag=0 WHERE date_format(sdd.date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} and wckc.link_id=#{linkId} GROUP BY sdd.date

SELECT date_format(wclc.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, count(wclc.id) as addWeCustomerNumber, count(if(wclc.chat_status=1,wclc.id,null)) as weCustomerActiveNumber, (SELECT count(*) from we_customer_link_count wclct where DATEDIFF(wclct.add_time, wclc.add_time)<0) as tdAddWeCustomerNumber, (SELECT count(if(wclc.chat_status=1,wclc.id,null)) from we_customer_link_count wclct where DATEDIFF(wclct.add_time, wclc.add_time)<0) as tdWeCustomerActiveNumber FROM we_customer_link_count wclc where wclc.link_id=#{linkId} and date_format(wclc.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY date_format(wclc.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT count(id) as addWeCustomerNumber, count(if(chat_status=1,id,null)) as weCustomerActiveNumber, count(if(to_days(add_time) = to_days(now()),id,null)) as tdAddWeCustomerNumber, count(if(chat_status=1 AND to_days(add_time) = to_days(now()),id,null)) as tdWeCustomerActiveNumber FROM we_customer_link_count where del_flag=0 and link_id=#{linkId}
